text: Another very enjoyable morning with @EnvAgency staff hearing about COVID-19 tracing in wastewater and emerging environmental threats of the future. Also great to hear from @chloe_hayes2 about her research into the invertebrates of intermittent streams #knowledgeexchange

text:
RT @EnvAgency: Attention anglers, the new #FishingLicence images have launched! 

Get set to relax in nature. Buy your new fishing licence…

@EnvAgency That's all very well but last year on two occasions I rang reference folks fishing off Ludford bridge in Ludlow??? Nothing done about it and you can bet all four of the " anglers " didn't even know what a rod licence was !! Poor sloppy disinterested caller on the phone !!
